channel.title: causal inference on Gray is colorful
channel.description: Recent content in causal inference on Gray is colorful

item.title: Difference-in-differences for causal inference
item.description: ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ## Warning: attributes are not identical across measure variables; ## they will be dropped df <- read.csv('card_and_krueger_1994.csv', header = TRUE) fit <- lm(employment ~ time + new_jersey + time:new_jersey, data = df) summary(fit) ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = employment ~ time + new_jersey + time:new_jersey, ## data = df) ## ## Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -10.
